name: PAC-MAN DASH!
summary: Pac-Man Dash! is a side-scrolling endless runner-style game released for iOS and Android devices, by Namco Bandai Games as part of the Pac-Man series of games.[1] The game's setting and design is primarily based on the CGI animated series Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures and contains many characters, references, and music tracks from it.
